description: Joomla is an award-winning Open Source CMS built and maintained by a strong community of volunteers who strive to produce robust, secure, easy-to-use software. As part of the Google Summer of Code 2022, I am mentoring the project, Guided Tours, which aims to integrate and enhance the existing tours into Joomla 4.0 release.
tasks: Mentored a student to accomplish the project within a defined timeline.
Evaluated the organization's needs and bolstered communications across the various verticals.
Helped the mentee contribute and become part of the open source community.
Established realistic work objectives and timeline expectations for the project.
